item.title: Bangalore to Hyderabad Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Planning a trip from Bangalore to Hyderabad can be an exciting adventure! One day trip or Two day trip from Bangalore to Hyderabad, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in a Car, then this two to three days plan works very well to cover places in Hyderabad. Route Bangalore -> Anantapur -> Kurnool -> Hyderabad -> Bangalore Here's a suggested
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
